TraceCollection¶

Created on Sun Dec 23 19:27:39 2012

@author: pmaunz

This is the class in which the data associated with a single trace is stored.

class ColumnSpec¶
static fromXmlElement(element)¶
toXmlElement(root)¶
class TraceCollection(record_timestamps=False)¶

Class to encapsulate a collection of traces with a common array of x values (or a single trace).

This class contains the data for all the traces, and takes care of saving and loading the traces from file

x¶

list[float]

array of x values

y¶

list[float]

array of y values for single trace

y<n>

list[float]

generated array of y values for collection of traces, where n=0,1,2,...

name¶

str

name associated with trace collection

description¶

dict

description data

description["comment"]

str

comment to add to file

description["traceCreation"]

str

the time the collection was created

header¶

str

header for saved file

filenamePattern¶

str

filename pattern to use when saving the trace

autosave¶

bool

if True, trace collection will be saved as soon as filenamePattern is set

saved¶

bool

True if trace collection has been saved

filename¶

str

full path to file

fileleaf¶

str

name only

filepath¶

str

path only

columnNames¶

list[str]

all column names in the saved file

addColumn(name, ignoreExisting=False)¶

adds a column with the given name, the column is saved in the file in the order added

addTracePlotting(traceplotting)¶
comment¶
filenamePattern

Get the pattern of the file name

indexColumn¶
loadTrace(filename)¶
loadTraceText(stream)¶
loadTraceXml(stream)¶
plot(penindex)¶

plot the data, penindex >= 0 gives requests the style with this number, penindex = -1 uses the first available style, penindex = -2 uses the previous style

recordTimeinterval(timeTickOffset)¶
save()¶

save the trace to file

TraceModel¶

Created on Wed Jan 02 09:53:48 2013

@author: Jonathan Mizrahi

This is the model used for the list of traces.

class TraceComboDelegate(penicons)¶

Class for combo box editor to select what trace color to use

Parameters:penicons (list[Qicon]) – list of icons to select trace color
createEditor(parent, option, index)¶

Create the combo box editor

setEditorData(editor, index)¶

Set the data in the editor based on the model

setModelData(editor, model, index)¶

Set the data in the model based on the editor

updateEditorGeometry(editor, option, index)¶
class TraceModel(traceList, penicons, graphicsViewDict, parent=None, highlightUnsaved=False)¶

Construct the TraceModel.

Parameters:
  • traceList (list[PlottedTrace]) – The initial list of traces
  • penicons (list[QtGui.QIcon]) – Icons for showing available plot colors
  • graphicsViewDict (dict) – dictionary of the available plot windows
addTrace(trace)¶

add a trace to the model

categoryCheckboxChange(index, value)¶

Check or uncheck the filename category of a set of traces

checkboxChange(index, value)¶

Plot or unplot the plottedTrace at the given index based on the checkbox

choice(index)¶

return available plot windows

comment(node)¶

return comment associated with node

commentChange(index, value)¶

change the comment and resave the trace

emitParentDataChanged(node, leftCol, rightCol)¶

Recursively tell parent nodes to update data from leftCol to rightCol

hasSiblings(node)¶

Returns True if node is not the only child of its parent, else False

isCategoryChecked(categoryNode)¶

Determine if category node should be checked or not, based on plot status of children

isCategorySaved(categoryNode)¶

Determine if category node has been saved or not

isDataNode(index)¶

check if index refers to a data node

nodeFromContent(trace)¶

Use traceDict to efficiently find node from trace

onMeasurementModelDataChanged(traceCreation, changeType, data)¶

Trace data changed via MeasurementTableModel. Update model.

onSaveUnsavedTrace(dataNode)¶

rename the category associated with dataNode, if any

penChange(index, value)¶

plot using the pen specified by value

removeNode(node)¶

Remove the node from the model, unplotting all connected traces

setValue(index, value)¶

set index EditRole to value

traceModelDataChanged¶
traceRemoved¶
windowChange(index, value)¶

change the plot window on which the plottedTrace is displayed

Traceui¶

Created on Fri Dec 28 18:40:30 2012

@author: pmaunz

class Settings(lastDir=None, plotstyle=0)¶

Class to hold Traceui settings

lastDir¶

str

last directory from which traces were opened

plotStyle¶

int

style to use for plotting new traces (i.e. lines, points, etc.)

unplotLastTrace¶

bool

whether last trace should be unplotted when new trace is created

collapseLastTrace¶

bool

whether last set of traces should be collapsed in tree when new trace set is created

expandNew¶

bool

whether new trace sets should be expanded when they are created

class Traceui(penicons, config, experimentName, graphicsViewDict, parent=None, lastDir=None, hasMeasurementLog=False, highlightUnsaved=False)¶

Class for the trace interface. .. attribute:: penicons

list[QtGui.QIcon]

icons to display available trace pens

config¶

configshelve

configuration dictionary

experimentName¶

str

name of experiment with which this Traceui is associated

graphicsViewDict¶

dict

dict of available plot windows

addTrace(trace, pen)¶

Add a trace to the model and plot it.

collapse(trace)¶

collapse node associated with trace

collapseLastTrace¶
expand(trace)¶

expand node associated with trace

expandNew¶
onActiveTraceChanged()¶

Display trace creation/finalized date/time when a trace is selected

onApplyStyle()¶

Execute when apply style button is clicked. Changed style of selected traces.

onClearOrPlot(changeType)¶

Execute when clear or plot action buttons are clicked.

onCollapseLastTrace(checked)¶
onExpandNew(checked)¶
onMeasurementLog()¶

Execute when open measurement log is clicked. Emit signal containing list of trace creation keys selected.

onOpenFile()¶

Execute when the open button is clicked. Open an existing trace file from disk.

onSave()¶

Save button is clicked. Save selected traces. If a trace has never been saved before, update model.

onShowOnlyLast()¶
onUnplotSetting(checked)¶
onViewClicked(index)¶

If one of the editable columns is clicked, begin to edit it.

openFile(filename)¶
openMeasurementLog¶
resizeColumnsToContents()¶
saveConfig()¶

Execute when the UI is closed. Save the settings to the config file.

selectedRowIndexes(useLastIfNoSelection=True, allowUnplotted=True)¶

Return selected row indexes, modified according to the boolean controls

selectedTraces(useLastIfNoSelection=False, allowUnplotted=True)¶

Return a list of the selected traces.

setPlotStyle(value)¶

Set the plot style to ‘value’.

setupUi(MainWindow)¶

Setup the UI. Create the model and the view. Connect all the buttons.
